FuncDef: The display pnp-state command displays information about the PnP status of APs managed by a master.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the PnP status of an AP with a specified ESN.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about the PnP status of APs managed by a master, run the display pnp-state command. The information includes the ESN, PnP status, and number of APs managed by the master.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
